experiences.name: Daily Yoga Sessions
experiences.description: Start your day with rejuvenating yoga practice overlooking the jungle
experiences.longDescription: Join our expert instructors for daily yoga sessions in our open-air pavilion. Whether you're a beginner or experienced practitioner, our classes are designed to harmonize body, mind, and spirit while surrounded by the sounds of nature. Morning and evening sessions available.

experiences.name: Traditional Balinese Spa
experiences.description: Indulge in authentic Balinese healing treatments
experiences.longDescription: Our spa offers traditional Balinese massage and healing treatments using organic, locally-sourced ingredients. Experience ancient wellness techniques passed down through generations, performed by skilled therapists in a serene jungle setting.

experiences.name: Guided Jungle Trekking
experiences.description: Explore the pristine jungle with our expert guides
experiences.longDescription: Embark on a guided trek through the surrounding jungle to discover hidden waterfalls, exotic wildlife, and ancient trees. Our knowledgeable guides share insights about the local ecosystem and medicinal plants. Available in various difficulty levels.

experiences.name: Farm to Table Dining
experiences.description: Savor organic cuisine from our sustainable gardens
experiences.longDescription: Experience the ultimate farm-to-table dining at our restaurant, where ingredients are harvested daily from our organic gardens. Our chef creates innovative dishes that celebrate local flavors and sustainable practices. Vegetarian and vegan options available.

experiences.name: Balinese Cooking Class
experiences.description: Learn to prepare authentic Balinese dishes
experiences.longDescription: Join our chef for an immersive cooking class where you'll learn to prepare traditional Balinese dishes using organic ingredients from our garden. Start with a market tour, then cook and enjoy your creations in our outdoor kitchen pavilion.

experiences.name: Sacred Temple Visit
experiences.longDescription: Visit ancient Balinese temples with our guide and learn about the island's rich spiritual traditions. Experience a traditional blessing ceremony and witness daily rituals. Includes transportation and traditional sarong.

experiences.name: Guided Meditation
experiences.description: Find inner peace through mindfulness practice
experiences.longDescription: Experience deep relaxation and mental clarity through guided meditation sessions. Held in our peaceful meditation pavilion surrounded by nature, these sessions incorporate breathing techniques and mindfulness practices suitable for all levels.

experiences.name: Waterfall Excursion
experiences.description: Journey to hidden waterfalls and natural pools
experiences.longDescription: Trek through rice terraces and jungle paths to discover stunning hidden waterfalls. Swim in crystal-clear natural pools and enjoy a picnic lunch surrounded by nature. Transportation, guide, and lunch included.
